references.paper_title: A style-based generator architecture for generative adversarial networks
references.reason: This paper introduces StyleGAN, a foundational model for high-quality image generation used extensively in the target paper's methods.
This seminal paper introduces Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs), the core technology upon which the target paper's methods rely.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: CLIP, introduced in this paper, is a crucial component in the target paper's approach to color alignment, enabling effective hair color transfer.

references.paper_title: Image-to-image translation with conditional adversarial networks
references.reason: This paper presents a method for image-to-image translation which is highly relevant to the task of hairstyle transfer, a major focus of the target paper.

references.paper_title: Gans trained by a two time-scale update rule converge to a local nash equilibrium
references.reason: This paper provides a key training technique for GANs that is relevant to the methods used in the target paper's training procedures.
